alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Owsley, south central Estill, northeastern Jackson, west central Breathitt, southern Lee and north central Clay Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vincent, or near Booneville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sturgeon, Pebworth and Corgleton around 505 PM EDT. Endee, Levi, Lower Buffalo and Enoch around 510 PM EDT. Scoville and Island City around 515 PM EDT. Booneville, Turin, Blake, Stay and Grass around 520 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Major, Chestnut Gap, Southfork, Ricetown, Conkling, Eversole, Gobbard, Cowcreek, Taff, Sebastian, Arnett and Trixie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley
